fields.summary: Cloudformation:  When Stack Fails to Deploy due to exceeding timeout, stack events don't record resources that failed to deploy

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Cloudformation:  When resource completes, consistently show CREATE_COMPLETE in stack events - even if stack fails to deploy

comments.body:
Stack timeout used to fail a stack and see that it rolled back properly and showed that state:

{noformat}
viglesias@viglesias-z620:~/Dropbox/creds/shared-edge$ euform-describe-stack-events vic2
EVENT   vic2    26f544b8-42e6-4fe9-bb46-44bdf75ec2db    AWS::CloudFormation::Stack      vic2    arn:aws:cloudformation::695914519336:stack/vic2/572a2b03-f418-43e4-b5c1-332ab1c224c9 2015-03-20T20:50:49.546Z        ROLLBACK_COMPLETE
EVENT   vic2    Resource1-DELETE_COMPLETE-1426884649097 AWS::EC2::Instance      Resource1       i-a972dd1a      2015-03-20T20:50:49.097Z    DELETE_COMPLETE
EVENT   vic2    Resource1-DELETE_IN_PROGRESS-1426884551039      AWS::EC2::Instance      Resource1       i-a972dd1a      2015-03-20T20:49:11.039Z     DELETE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT   vic2    400a32f9-1c3d-4ed3-919d-c8df1c6cb785    AWS::CloudFormation::Stack      vic2    arn:aws:cloudformation::695914519336:stack/vic2/572a2b03-f418-43e4-b5c1-332ab1c224c9 2015-03-20T20:49:10.269Z        ROLLBACK_IN_PROGRESS    Create stack failed.  Rollback requested by user.
EVENT   vic2    04dc2a16-ac18-4b06-9bc1-65b0c47bcc3f    AWS::CloudFormation::Stack      vic2    arn:aws:cloudformation::695914519336:stack/vic2/572a2b03-f418-43e4-b5c1-332ab1c224c9 2015-03-20T20:49:09.904Z        CREATE_FAILED   Stack creation timed out.
EVENT   vic2    Resource1-CREATE_FAILED-1426884549264   AWS::EC2::Instance      Resource1       i-a972dd1a      2015-03-20T20:49:09.264Z    CREATE_FAILED    Resource creation cancelled
EVENT   vic2    Resource1-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1426884476585      AWS::EC2::Instance      Resource1       i-a972dd1a      2015-03-20T20:47:56.585Z     CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT   vic2    Resource1-CREATE_IN_PROGRESS-1426884475524      AWS::EC2::Instance      Resource1               2015-03-20T20:47:55.524Z    CREATE_IN_PROGRESS
EVENT   vic2    47a688a0-2f49-41f2-a7c6-6c69ab40c73a    AWS::CloudFormation::Stack      vic2    arn:aws:cloudformation::695914519336:stack/vic2/572a2b03-f418-43e4-b5c1-332ab1c224c9 2015-03-20T20:47:54.681Z        CREATE_IN_PROGRESS      User Initiated
{noformat}

{noformat}
viglesias@viglesias-z620:~/Dropbox/creds/shared-edge$ euform-describe-stacks
STACK   vic2    ROLLBACK_COMPLETE                       2015-03-20T20:47:54.283Z
PARAMETER       ImageId         emi-4729cf04
STACK   vic     CREATE_COMPLETE Complete!               2015-03-20T20:47:34.967Z
PARAMETER       ImageId         emi-4729cf04
viglesias@viglesias-z620:~/Dropbox/creds/shared-edge$
{noformat}
